welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Izumo, a city known for its rich history and stunning Shinto shrines. We hope you take the time to explore this charming city and all it has to offer during your stay."

restaurants.name: 献上そば 羽根屋本店
restaurants.description: 献上そば 羽根屋本店 is a soba restaurant located in 出雲市.
restaurants.address: 今市町本町549, 出雲市, 島根県, 693-0001

restaurants.address: 大津新崎町4-1, 出雲市, 島根県, 693-0012

restaurants.description: Pastelaria Paizão is a brazilian restaurant located in 出雲市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Izumo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Izumo Airport handles flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Izumo Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miho Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Miho Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.
